list_definition.mean_english: vật đội trên đầu để trang sức
list_definition.definition: something, usually ornamental, which is worn on, and covers, the head

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: The tribesmen were wearing headdresses of fur and feathers.

list_ex_of_english: A feathered headdress was added in relief to frame a head or skull, which was missing.
The examples of feather headdresses are described too vaguely to identify.
Each team would then include regular players (those with simple helmets), as well as prominent ones (those with elaborate headdresses).
All of them wear elaborate headdresses, capes, shoes, and different types of personal ornaments.
The headdress consists of a headband with an array of feathers and a broad stripe hanging from behind.
The fibers may have been part of headdresses, wigs, mantas, or mats the individuals wore or sat on, again signifying their authority.
Unfortunately, the medallion is severely deteriorated, and the headdress has not been preserved; in fact, all that remains of the face are the round eyepieces.
However, the headdress scarcely resembles that of the goddess.
